headlines.description: — Steven Gerrard got the better of former England teammate Frank Lampard in their first meeting as managers as Aston Villa beat Everton 2-1 thanks to goals by Danny Ings and Emi Buendia in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Villa beats Everton 2-1 as Gerrard gets better of Lampard

headlines.description: Gabriel Jesus scored twice as Arsenal beat Leicester City 4-2 at the Emirates Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jesus bags brace as Arsenal see off Leicester

events.name: Newcastle United at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Brighton and Hove Albion had two efforts cleared off the line as they were held to a frustrating 0-0 draw with Newcastle United on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle hold off Brighton in goalless draw

headlines.description: Manchester City eased past newly-promoted Bournemouth to claim a 4-0 win at the Etihad Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City hit four past Bournemouth in easy win

headlines.description: Southampton's Kyle Walker-Peters and Joe Aribo cancelled out a double from Leeds United's Rodrigo as the home side roared back from two goals down.
headlines.shortLinkText: Saints fight back to earn draw against Leeds

headlines.description: Wolves and Fulham will have to wait for their first Premier League win of the season after playing out a goalless draw on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fulham miss late pen in stalemate at Wolves

headlines.description: Manchester United suffered a 4-0 thrashing at Brentford in Erik ten Hag's second Premier League match on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man United suffer 4-0 thrashing at Brentford
